src:
Quiso esquivar una moto y se estrelló contra un árbol
03 Nov 2019 by Redacción Diario de Cuyo
Durante la tarde de ayer, minutos después de las 15, se produjo un violento accidente de tránsito sobre calle Aberastain entre 12 y 13, en Pocito. Según informaron fuentes policiales, un Ford Escort que se trasladaba por la arteria principal de Norte a Sur, intentó esquivar una moto que dobló hacia el Este sin mirar atrás, chocando de frente contra un árbol.
Marcelo Olmos, de 45 años de edad, conductor del auto, tuvo que ser trasladado de urgencia al Hospital Rawson, aunque por el momento se desconoce su estado.
text:
He wanted to dodge a motorcycle and crashed into a tree
03 Nov 2019 by Cuyo Daily Writing
During the afternoon yesterday, minutes after 15, there was a violent traffic accident on Aberastain Street between 12 and 13, in Pocito. According to police sources, a Ford Escort who was moving along the main artery from North to South, tried to dodge a motorcycle that turned east without looking back, crashing straight into a tree.
Marcelo Olmos, 45, a driver of the car, had to be rushed to Rawson Hospital, although his status is unknown at the moment.
